  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x290

        LayoutText {#text} at (785,0) size 15x15
          text run at (785,0) width 15: "X"

        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 495x18
          text run at (0,0) width 495: "There should be no red on this page (look in the upper right hand corner too)."
